0.text: You found a Bow and Arrows! Perfect for striking far away objects! Hold the button down to aim and release it to fire
You found a boomerang! Use its curve and stunning power to your advantage!
You got a sword! It may be basic, but its effective at close range. Equip it to the face buttons and swing away!
You acquired a new Spirit Ability, the Spirit Bomb! This powerful explosive can ignore physical barriers! Hold the button down to extend its distance

1.text: Try using it on cracked walls, you never know what may be behind them!

0.text: You found a key! Locked doors can't stop you now! Only works in the area it was found.
